mapper.select: select SID, SENDERNAME, SENDERLOGINID, READ, RECEIVENAME, RECEIVELOGINID, CREATEDATE, RECEIVEDATE, MESSAGETYPE, HAVEFILE, ITEMID, PRODUCTID, ORDERID, RELATIONID, SMTTYPEID, SHOPTYPEID, SHOPTYPENAME, CATEGORYID, CATEGORYNAME, STATUS, APPLYOPER, OPER, OPERTIME, ASSIGNOPER, ASSIGNOPERTIME, UPDATEFLAG, UPDATETIME, OPENFLAG, CUSTOMERTYPEID, CUSTOMERTYPE, TYPEID, TYPENAME, TYPECOLOR, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, PRODUCTURL, FILEURL, ORDERURL, PRODUCTNAME, CONTENT, DESCR, ANSWER, UPDATEDESCR from db_smtmessage where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SID, SENDERNAME, SENDERLOGINID, READ, RECEIVENAME, RECEIVELOGINID, CREATEDATE, RECEIVEDATE, MESSAGETYPE, HAVEFILE, ITEMID, PRODUCTID, ORDERID, RELATIONID, SMTTYPEID, SHOPTYPEID, SHOPTYPENAME, CATEGORYID, CATEGORYNAME, STATUS, APPLYOPER, OPER, OPERTIME, ASSIGNOPER, ASSIGNOPERTIME, UPDATEFLAG, UPDATETIME, OPENFLAG, CUSTOMERTYPEID, CUSTOMERTYPE, TYPEID, TYPENAME, TYPECOLOR, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, PRODUCTURL, FILEURL, ORDERURL, PRODUCTNAME, CONTENT, DESCR, ANSWER, UPDATEDESCR from db_smtmessage
mapper.sql: SID , SENDERNAME , SENDERLOGINID , READ , RECEIVENAME , RECEIVELOGINID , CREATEDATE , RECEIVEDATE , MESSAGETYPE , HAVEFILE , ITEMID , PRODUCTID , ORDERID , RELATIONID , SMTTYPEID , SHOPTYPEID , SHOPTYPENAME , CATEGORYID , CATEGORYNAME , STATUS , APPLYOPER , OPER , OPERTIME , ASSIGNOPER , ASSIGNOPERTIME , UPDATEFLAG , UPDATETIME , OPENFLAG , CUSTOMERTYPEID , CUSTOMERTYPE , TYPEID , TYPENAME , TYPECOLOR , RESERVE1 , RESERVE2 , RESERVE3 , RESERVE4 , RESERVE5 , RESERVE6 , PRODUCTURL , FILEURL , ORDERURL , PRODUCTNAME , CONTENT , DESCR , ANSWER , UPDATEDESCR

SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SENDERNAME = #{sendername,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SENDERLOGINID = #{senderloginid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
READ = #{read,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RECEIVENAME = #{receivename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RECEIVELOGINID = #{receiveloginid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
RECEIVEDATE = #{receivedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
MESSAGETYPE = #{messagetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
HAVEFILE = #{havefile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ITEMID = #{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RELATIONID = #{relationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SMTTYPEID = #{smttypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SHOPTYPEID = #{shoptypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SHOPTYPENAME = #{shoptypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CATEGORYID = #{categoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CATEGORYNAME = #{categoryname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
APPLYOPER = #{applyoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
ASSIGNOPER = #{assignoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ASSIGNOPERTIME = #{assignopertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
UPDATEFLAG = #{updateflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CUSTOMERTYPEID = #{customertypeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CUSTOMERTYPE = #{customertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
TYPEID = #{typeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
TYPENAME = #{typename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
TYPECOLOR = #{typecolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE6 = #{reserve6,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PRODUCTURL = #{producturl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
FILEURL = #{fileurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
ORDERURL = #{orderurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
PRODUCTNAME = #{productname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
ANSWER = #{answer,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
UPDATEDESCR = #{updatedescr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1
